i1.name: Monkey's Agility
i1.blurb: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|5 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{sti|{{as|10% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds every time he uses an ability, stacking up to 3 times, up to a maximum of {{sti|ms|{{as|15 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{sti|{{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Four Stances:}} '''Udyr''' has no [[Champion ability|ultimate ability]] and instead has 4 [[Champion ability|basic abilities]]. Each of his abilities provides a passive effect that lasts until he activates a different ability, called his current ''Stance''. Activating any of his abilities will prevent his previous ''Stance'' from triggering any more on-hit effects, and will prevent him from activating another ability for 2 seconds.
notes: * Further stance activations at maximum stacks of ''Monkey's Agility'' will refresh the timer.

* Despite having 4 abilities each with 5 ranks, '''Udyr''' is not able to level beyond the usual limit under normal circumstances - meaning he must choose how to allocate his points and will not be able to reach maximum rank on each of his abilities, unless with the use of {{ii|Elixir of Skill}} from {{ri|Kleptomancy}}, or in the featured game mode, {{tip|Ultra Rapid Fire}}.
** {{ii|Elixir of Skill}} grants the additional point only if it's used before level 18.

riot.name: Tiger Stance
riot.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.
riot.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will perform a Tiger Strike, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds.

If a target is affected by Tiger Strike, a new application of Tiger Strike will deal the remaining damage instantly.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

q1.name: Tiger Stance
q1.blurb: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.
q1.description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' [[basic attack]]s generate ''Tiger'' stacks [[attack effects|on-hit]], up to 3. At 3 stacks, '''Udyr's''' next basic attack is a ''Tiger Strike'', which deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} over 2 seconds as well as instantly dealing any remaining damage from any previous ''Tiger Strikes''.
q1.leveling: {{st|Total Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 150}} {{as|(+ {{ap|120 to 180}}% AD)}}|Damage Per Half-Second|{{ap|30/4 to 150/4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|120/4 to 180/4}}% AD)}}}}
q1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Tiger Speed:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 ''Tiger'' stacks.
notes: * The damage dealt by Tiger Strike is classified as ability damage, which is unusual for on-hit effects.

* The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active.
* ''Tiger Stance's'' primed DoT does not persist through stance changes.
* The triggering attacks will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can [[critical strike|critically strike]] as normal.
** Unlike most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from ''Tiger Stance'' will not apply [[life steal]].
** Critical strikes do not interact with the bonus damage from ''Tiger Stance''.
** The persistent on-hit physical damage can successfully be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} and {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}.
*** However, they do not prevent application of the active DoT.
** If '''Udyr''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, neither the persistent damage nor the active damage will be applied, and it will consume the empowered attack of the active.

riot.name: Turtle Stance
riot.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.
riot.tooltip:

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

At 3 stacks, '''Udyr's''' next basic attack {{tip|heal|heals}} him for {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|11|type='''missing''' health|key=%|2.5 to 5|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=2.5% increased by 1% per 1% of '''missing''' health}} of his '''maximum''' health|health}}}}.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Spiritual Shell:}} '''Udyr''' {{tip|shields}} himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 ''Turtle'' stacks.
notes: * The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active.

riot.name: Bear Stance
riot.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
riot.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for {{ e3 }} second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

e1.name: Bear Stance
e1.blurb: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
e1.description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks {{tip|stun}} his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
e1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Primal Charge:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and is {{tip|ghosted}} for the next few seconds. Additionally, his next basic attack gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and causes him to {{tt|leap|Not considered a dash}} to his target.
e1.leveling2:
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|15 to 35}}%}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Movement Speed Duration|{{ap|2 to 3}}}}
e1.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|This is not affected by cooldown reduction, and only applies for the persistent effect.}}
notes: * ''Bear Stance's'' self-displacement does '''not''' count as a [[dash]] for the purposes of {{ri|Sudden Impact}}.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can [[critical strike|critically strike]] as normal.
* ''Bear Stance's'' stun does not interact with structures.

* If the enhanced autoattack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} or {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}} or Udyr is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, the target will not be stunned nor receive any damage.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability and incur the 5 second stun immunity.
